title: Definite integral of a discontinuous function

content.question: The graph of f is shown above for <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mn>0</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>4</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3BF3@</annotation> </semantics> </math>. What is the value of <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <mrow> <msubsup> <mo>∫</mo> <mn>0</mn> <mn>4</mn> </msubsup> <mi>f</mi> </mrow> </mstyle><mrow><mo>(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3F92@</annotation> </semantics> </math>?
